icon/name.description: String: SVG filename from @/assets/icons/ like 'github' for 'github.svg'

icon/ratio.description: Boolean: If SVG is not square, add this like <icon name='...' ratio /> to respect ratio

icon/stroke.description: Boolean: For SVG if designed by <svg stroke-width='...' />

icon/default.description: String: Default icon if not found
